In England, in the seven days to 27 May, there were 16,293 new confirmed cases (28.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 May, there were 12,669 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 29% (3,624 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 01 June is 3,918,522 (6,961.7 cases per 100,000 population).
